description: Don't just hear your music. Live it. Feel it. In every bone of your body and every fiber of your soul. With balance and clarity. With uncompromising comfort and convenience. Every tone in crystal clear sound quality. From the highest notes to the deepest grooves. The 808 Over-the-Ear Stereo Headphones provide stereo quality sound with style. The 808s consist of a foldable design with detachable, tangle-free cables. The cables include, a flat cable with mic or DJ-style cable. For easy travel, these headphones come with a durable carrying case. 808 studio-quality headphones your music the way it was meant to be heard.
title: 808 Over-The-Ear Stereo Headphones - Gloss White (HPA88WHG)
